item.title: Quick Setup
item.description: Here are some one liners for quick and easy first setups of various operating systems. Check out this to learn more: Quick-Setup Linux (without sudo): curl -sSL https://git.io/JLxkS | bash Windows (Administrator Privileges needed): iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://git.io/JtUwY'))
